title: Fibonacci numbers and time-space tradeoffs
summary:
A few days ago I wrote about Fibonacci numbers and certificates. As I pointed out in the article, there’s no need to certify Fibonacci numbers, but the point of the post was to illustrate the idea of a solution certificate in a simple context. Practical uses of certificates are more complicated. This time I want […]

The post Fibonacci numbers and time-space tradeoffs first appeared on John D. Cook.
